languages.text: "Мною был сделан вывод, что машинный дух этого судна весьма необычен. Необходимо провести полный цикл свято-диагностики с последующим комплементат-ритуалом. Он заставит дух, стоящий за всеми странными событиями последнего времени, проявиться. Тогда мы сможем понять его природу и поступить соответственно ей".

traits.locale_text: "Мною был сделан вывод, что машинный дух этого судна весьма необычен. Необходимо провести полный цикл свято-диагностики с последующим комплиментат-ритуалом. Он заставит дух, стоящий за всеми странными событиями последнего времени, проявиться. Тогда мы сможем понять его природу и поступить соответственно ей".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."
languages.original_text: "Мною был сделан вывод, что машинный дух этого судна весьма необычен. Необходимо провести полный цикл свято-диагностики с последующим комплементат-ритуалом. Он заставит дух, стоящий за всеми странными событиями последнего времени, проявиться. Тогда мы сможем понять его природу и поступить соответственно ей".

languages.text: 「到達した結論は以下のとおり。この艦隊の機械精霊は最も類稀なものである。神聖なる診断の完全サイクルに続き、補足儀式を行わなくてはならない。この儀式により精霊は最近の事象を明らかにする責任を負う。そうなれば我々はその本質を理解し、その本質に適した対策を取ることができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: 「到達した結論は以下のとおり。この艦隊の機械精霊は最も類稀なものである。神聖なる診断の完全サイクルに続き、補足儀式を行わなくてはならない。この儀式により精霊は最近の事象を明らかにする責任を負う。そうなれば我々はその本質を理解し、その本質に適した対策を取ることができるだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我得出的结论是：这艘船的机魂非常特别。我需要在重组仪式结束之后，进行完整的神圣诊断周期。这个仪式可以让造成最近这些事故的机魂现身。等它露面之后，我们便可以了解它的本质，采取适用于该本质的行动。”
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: “我得出的结论是：这艘船的机魂非常特别。我需要在重组仪式结束之后，进行完整的神圣诊断周期。这个仪式可以让造成最近这些事故的机魂现身。等它露面之后，我们便可以了解它的本质，采取适用于该本质的行动。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin zu folgendem Schluss gekommen: Der Maschinengeist dieses Schiffs ist außergewöhnlich. Ein voller Zyklus heiliger Diagnostik muss durchgeführt werden, gefolgt von einem Complementa-Ritual. Durch dieses Ritual wird sich der Geist, der für die jüngsten Ereignisse verantwortlich ist, zeigen müssen. Dann können wir seine Natur verstehen und geeignete Maßnahmen ergreifen."
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin zu folgendem Schluss gekommen: Der Maschinengeist dieses Schiffs ist außergewöhnlich. Ein voller Zyklus heiliger Diagnostik muss durchgeführt werden, gefolgt von einem Complementa-Ritual. Durch dieses Ritual wird sich der Geist, der für die jüngsten Ereignisse verantwortlich ist, zeigen müssen. Dann können wir seine Natur verstehen und geeignete Maßnahmen ergreifen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'en conclus que l'esprit de la machine de ce vaisseau est des plus extraordinaires. Un cycle complet de diagnostics sacrés doit être réalisé, ainsi qu'un rituel complémentaire qui obligera l'esprit responsable des événements récents à se révéler. De cette manière, nous pourrons comprendre sa nature et prendre les mesures qui s'imposent. »
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: « J'en conclus que l'esprit de la machine de ce vaisseau est des plus extraordinaires. Un cycle complet de diagnostics sacrés doit être réalisé, ainsi qu'un rituel complémentaire qui obligera l'esprit responsable des événements récents à se révéler. De cette manière, nous pourrons comprendre sa nature et prendre les mesures qui s'imposent. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «He llegado a la siguiente conclusión: el espíritu máquina de esta nave es de lo más extraordinario. Debe realizarse un ciclo entero de diagnósticos sagrados, seguidos de un complementa-ritual. Este ritual hará que se manifieste el espíritu responsable de los recientes acontecimientos. Cuando lo haga, podremos comprender su naturaleza y tomar las medidas pertinentes».
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: «He llegado a la siguiente conclusión: el espíritu máquina de esta nave es de lo más extraordinario. Debe realizarse un ciclo entero de diagnósticos sagrados, seguidos de un complementa-ritual. Este ritual hará que se manifieste el espíritu responsable de los recientes acontecimientos. Cuando lo haga, podremos comprender su naturaleza y tomar las medidas pertinentes».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Şu sonuca ulaştım: Bu geminin makine ruhu gerçekten olağanüstü. Tam bir kutsal tanı döngüsü gerçekleştirilmeli, hemen ardından da tümleyici ayin düzenlenmeli. Bu ayin, güncel olaylardan sorumlu ruhu kendini göstermeye zorlayacak. Kendini gösterdiği zaman da mizacını anlayıp söz konusu mizaca uygun eylemleri hayata geçirebileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the following conclusion: this vessel's machine spirit is most extraordinary. A full cycle of sacred diagnostics must be performed followed by a complementa-ritual. This ritual will force the spirit responsible for these recent events to reveal itself. Once it does, we will be able to understand its nature and take action applicable to said nature."

traits.locale_text: "Şu sonuca ulaştım: Bu geminin makine ruhu gerçekten olağanüstü. Tam bir kutsal tanı döngüsü gerçekleştirilmeli ve hemen ardından tümleyici ayin düzenlenmeli. Bu ayin, güncel olaylardan sorumlu ruhu, kendini göstermeye zorlayacak. Kendini gösterdiği zaman da mizacını anlayıp söz konusu mizaca uygun eylemleri hayata geçirebileceğiz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
